item.description:
Let's take advantage of Aspire's special bar menu offered Monday through Friday, 4 - 7pm.

I won't be making reservations, since we will be in the bar area. Just come and grab an available seat!

$1 items (priced per piece)
Jumbo shrimp cocktail w/ cocktail sauce and lemon
Steak or chicken skewers w/ peanut sauce
Oyster on the half shell
Crispy Chicken Fingers
Duck spring rolls


plus $1 Narragansett draft

$5 items
Burger with Fries
Artisan pizza
Calamari
Clam cakes and chowder


$5 martinis
blueberry
almond cappucino
black cherry cosmo
007 martini
black stockings martini


$5 Linderman's Wine
chardonnay
pinot grigio
cabernet
pinot noir
item.name: Weekday Wind Down @ Aspire
